q: At practice Wednesday, Michael Vick loosened up throwing passes to Falcons quarterback Matt Ryan, who is making his first Pro Bowl appearance in his third season and succeeded Michael Vick in Atlanta. Matt is great. The coaching staff is great. We're just having a good time, he said.`` I like what they're doing in the offence and it's been easy. We're going to go out and try to have fun and everybody enjoy each other.'' Michael Vick

Bill Lockyer , on Monday held a conference call in which he took issue with the critics of the current pension system. They've confused the near-term budget shortfalls with the long-term funding obligations, and grossly inflated the size of the long-term liabilities, he said.
